project: 微信小程序首页核心功能接口封装和联调 - 音乐点数、Banner图管理、创作提示词管理、热门推荐音乐
description: Miniprogram homepage API integration: Credit balance, Banner carousel, Prompt templates, Hot music recommendations

tasks.title: Phase 1: Core Optimization - Request Deduplication, Caching, Error Handling, Token Refresh
Phase 2: Image HTTPS Migration - Local Image Preloading & CDN Preparation
Phase 3: Code Quality & Testing - TypeScript Migration, Unit Testing, Error Monitoring
Phase 4: E2E Testing & Release - Integration Testing, Performance Verification, Production Deployment
